title: Confessions: skins you want for fanservice reasons.
body:
I recently had a discussion with people complaining about skins like Battle Bunny Riven, Kitty Kat Katarina, Pool Party Graves or Santa Braum been "pure fanservice and boring".

I had to say I absolutely disagree with that, and because of that I'm going to create this thread.

Basically, comment a skin you want to happen only because of fanservice reasons. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

In my case:

-Pool Party Sona: I know Riot wouldn't make a skin with Sona wearing a micro bikini like people do in fan-arts, but I would love to see it anyway.

-Pool Party Ahri: for the same reason tahan Pool Party Sona.

replies.body: a skin for aurelion sol {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
He asked for "fanservice" not "miracle"

reverse kled 

kled now wears a dracalops onesie

and skaarl wears a kled hat and boots and closhes
bump it to 1820 and have skaarl try to immitate kled talking and kled getting mad at him

What's the problem with fanservice skins tho? The only issue would be,if they were only for gender and be pre-dominant,which thank god,they aren't.

Mine skin would be Siren Kayn.Basically you start  as a human with partially aquatic features on one arm/side.After that you can choose a more alluring human form or a shark like/creature from the depth monster form.
Creepy, but enticing. I like it.

Pool Party Shen.

Abs, glorious abs!
Face, glorious face!

He'll have it covered in giant scuba diving mask.
He learnt from kakashi Sensei.
Full armour Taric, for my armoured knight fetish.
Paladin Taric.
battle bunny shyvanna
Well she does have enough shyvaNYA fan art.

Pool Party Yasuo, Kayn, Ezreal, Varus, etc.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Star Guardian Taric. Debonair Taric. Battle Bunny Taric. ORDER OF THE BANANA TARIC. And basically any other Taric skin that reduces his clothing down to his skivvies.
I doubt Order of the Banana Taric will happen, if only so people won't just call him Banana Hammock Taric instead.
That's the entire point.
Reverse (human) Thresh as a legendary skin
Poolparty {{champion:28}} for obvious reasons ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

> [{quoted}](name=Death Rex,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=REwqUdzn,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-01-17T21:05:51.408+0000)
>
> Poolparty {{champion:28}} for obvious reasons ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

I dont think there can ever exist any EVE skin with more fan-service than her classical without giving league an 18+ rating...
True ice bikini/pasties Ashe (pool party basically.) (˵ ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°˵) I'm a terrible person.
Definitely Not Orianna. Make her look as human as possible.
You're ruining the robot fetish

Surfer {{champion:163}}
EDIT damn actually it wouldn't have to be fanservic-ey, this would be fantastic.
Evelynn in a nun costume :triumph: {{champion:28}}  {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
What about riot Rakan and mafia Xayah?

what are we on like 7 years of asking for catboy ezreal now

still waitin on that
Pool party {{champion:67}} wearing a high cut swimsuit
Space Engineer Yorick/Heimerdinger; taking inspiration from Dead Space.

The ONLY reason people want Pool Party Ahri is because 'bathing suits!' despite Riot outright saying they didn't want the Pool Party line to just be putting female champions in bikinis. (For instance, Leona's armour becoming a sarong)  They can defend with 'but water vfx' all they want, I see the truth. 

That said...

> [{quoted}](name=Fairyfleur,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=REwqUdzn,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-01-17T18:09:40.232+0000)
>
> Pool Party Yasuo, Kayn, Ezreal, Varus, etc.
> 
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

I'mma add Lucian and Darius to that list too.

* Magic Mike/Stripper {{champion:202}} because he is my one true love.
* Pool Party {{champion:240}} for the simple reason I want Skaarl to be an [axolotl ](https://i.pinimg.com/736x/70/6f/9a/706f9a8434710ed8688db300a4d2af12--unusual-animals-underwater-life.jpg)because they are adorable and I feel like I yell at her too much... :( I'm sorry Skaarl. 
* Star Guardian  {{champion:420}} because I love big strong women who can embrace me with elo.
* Vandal {{champion:222}} to give her a more Harley Quinn look (I love Harley too, sorry) and Vandal {{champion:143}} to go with her (Poison Ivy, who Zyra pretty much ripped off, noah fence Rito.)
* Gym Teacher {{champion:134}} . When she ults, a whistle blows and the sound of a million dodgeballs hit the enemy harder than puberty hit me in 6th grade.

Bush Garen
Pool party bard
An entire line of skins for road warrior.
Pool party orianna
Debonair zac
Ao shin, not as a skin but as a champion (but I'd settle on a skin)
A footsie pajama skin for Lulu like meowkai or moo cow ali
Just to name a few
battle bunny braum, graves, rengar(mainly cause it would fit him somehow, that and i've seen images ;3)

Bloons tower defense {{champion:74}} 

His turrets would be little monkeys throwing darts

PROJECT {{champion:2}} complete with holo-axes and full closed horned cybernetic helmet.

Pool Party {{champion:143}} her spitters are water guns, her vine lash is a fishing net, lashers are snapping scuttlers, her ult is a giant whirl pool that explodes like a depth charge for the knock up.

Brodamyere, aka Bro skin for {{champion:23}} giant cardboard sword, running around in a bed sheet (tied like a toga) beer can in his left hand that he chugs when he heals and crushes and throws when he ults. Think Frank the Tank from Old Skool

PROJECT: Bard

I'd love to hear is bwongs with the project filter over them.
POOL PARTY KATARINA OBVIOUSLY. SHE WAS EVEN IN THE POOL PARTY SPLASH ARTSSSSS

i want as many male champions to have pool party skins as possible some good mentions are 
{{champion:201}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:80}}{{champion:4}}
Heartseeker {{champion:203}}
Like, how fanservice-y are we talking? Like, League Fanfic (rated M) level of fanservice or just "Pool Party {{champion:84}} and {{champion:39}}" level?
Vampire Ahri.

I wanna see DragonSlayer Vayne remade to be armored like the others.

I wanna see Dragon Sorcercess Evelynn + Nurse Evelynn 

Lastly Frostblade Yasuo with some nice glutes would be nice

I had high hopes for sweetheart Xayah.

What we got isn't bad, but it left me feeling a bit underwhelmed.

Taric, but it's like Evelynn where her clothes are shadows but for Taric his clothes are clouds that reveal just enough skin for me to want...

More

Pool Party {{champion:13}} 
Beards are my weakness

Repairman Heimerdinger, for all your fan servicing needs. 

Turrets are little fans that shoot strong gusts of wind.
W has that head-strap rocket thing except it's a fan, which falls apart, throwing a bunch of fan blades forward. 
E throws a fan that seems to be in disrepair, which promptly explodes on impact.
Homeguards/otherwise appropriately speed boosted = propelled by a fan

When it comes to fanservice, all I really want is -one- splash art for a dude where his back's to the camera and we can see his butt. Something akin to frostblade irelia, cmon, rito, pls. Santa Draven's backside's so well defined in game with the red tights, I was so depressed to see it wasn't featured in the splash. Give us some boy butt already.

{{champion:4}} {{champion:104}} 
Twisted Fate and Graves matching Figure Skating skins
